hProduct 1 - single occurrence test

This page was design to test that values of a hProduct which are meant to have only a single occurrence are parsed correctly.

From: hProduct test suite 0.3

Author: George Brocklehurst

Tests:

Test Result Comment
hproduct[0].fn IsEqualTo("Samsung LE32B450") The fn (formatted name) is a singular value
hproduct[0].brand HasProperty(true) The brand is a singular value
hproduct[0].price IsEqualTo("£305") The price is a singular value
hproduct[0].description IsEqualTo("32 inch LCD HD ready television") The description is a singular value
hproduct[0].url IsEqualTo("http://www.reevoo.com/p/samsung-le32b450") The url is a singular value
